name: Imperial Affairs
description:
Imperial Affairs is an online simulation and role-playing game set in the Qing Dynasty. You will start as an aspiring maid, get entangled in the princes' clash, and experience every aspect of the legendary palace life. It tells an extraordinary story of love, ambition and royal intrigue.

----GAME FEATURES----
Explore imperial fashion styles
Pursue touching courtly romance
Choose your love stories
Recruit loyal bosom friends
